::Battera::

"What can I do to help you to beleive me?  Have you put a knife to my 
throat while the leaders are talking? Have you torture me to prove 
that I speak the truth? Rip off my pred symbol and put on a Maximal 
symbol?  Please, I am willing to do what ever it takes to prove that 
I am speaking the truth. There is no trickery here.  All we want is 
for all the factions to live in peace and harmony.  I know it sounds 
too good to be true, but it is."

She slumped into her chair.  She had just about ehausted every idea 
she had to try to convince this maximal that she was sincere.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex frowns, looking at Battera.
> 
> "If Voluis is a normal Predacon, he would gladly sacrifice a bot to 
destroy 
> the Maximal commander."
> 
> His words sounded a bit unsure. The visit from Voluis had confused 
him, and 
> he was tempted to believe the ex-Predacon's words. His strong 
feelings 
> against the Predacons interfered with that, however, and Rex was in 
a state 
> of indicition.
